content: Chamfer Dust Shroud - Vertical ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for grinders and sanders- - ### FEATURES:Features Virtually dustless grinding Precise control of chamfer size – you can use an exchangeable clip-in guide for exact chamfering Robust – carbon-fiber-reinforced construction to withstand tough jobsite conditions Avoid chipped edges – use with a continuous rim cup wheel to reduce the risk of chipping the concrete Applications Grinding chamfers into concrete edges ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Dust extraction hoods Additional Accessory Information: Cubierta antipolvo (chaflán) DGH 130 CG VERTICAL Technical Data | Accessory type | Dust extraction hoods | Additional Accessory Information | Cubierta antipolvo (chaflán) DGH 130 CG VERTICAL ### ITEMS- 2273030 - Chamfer Dust Shroud - Vertical - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x KONZEPT B 1 Base module
